Name: Pattern Recognition - IND
Text: We need to produce a response that addresses the three tasks: identify anomalies, generate hypotheses, propose database queries.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Must use LaTeX for math expressions. Use code formatting with Prettier print width 80. Provide queries in SQL. Also mention that we are using GPT OSS 20b if asked about model; not needed.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: We should structure answer: Anomalies list, hypotheses list, verification queries.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Also maybe include explanation of how to interpret event logs.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Let's craft answer accordingly. Use markdown sections.

Name: Validation - IND
Text: Also ensure code blocks with language sql and proper formatting (80 char width). Prettier may wrap lines at 80 characters; we can manually format accordingly.
